How have you been? I feel like we haven't caught up in a while.
Yeah, it's been a long time. I've been pretty busy lately with work and other things. How about you?
I've been good, thanks for asking. Have you been keeping up with your hobbies? I remember you used to be really into painting and knitting.
Ugh, don't even get me started on that. I tried picking up my knitting needles the other day and I just couldn't get into it. It's so frustrating when you lose interest in something you used to love.

I understand how that can be discouraging. Sometimes, our interests and passions change over time, and that's okay. It might be worth exploring new hobbies and activities that spark your interest now.
